## species occurrence data

* observations of species in nature
* collected specimens
* fossils
<br><br>
* `+` metadata/other data

## A taxize like 1-stop shop

`spocc` - [https://github.com/ropensci/spocc](https://github.com/ropensci/spocc)

* Access to most data sources prev slide
* Single user interface to biodiversity data
* Easily combine data (partially)
* Reduces cognitive load -> learn a single user interface
